posts.description:
We are hiring a Technical Project Manager.

-> Responsibilities:

•	Assign resources to projects while monitoring and tracking the progress for individual project engagements.
•	Participate in the creation of user acceptance criteria.
•	Manage and update task objectives and performance while helping to ensure that project commitments are met as specified in the client contract.
•	Manage project budget to revenue, and costs.
•	Develop new business within projects and identify new business elsewhere in the client environment.
•	Assist with preparation of the statement of work as well the delivery of the quality assurance review.

-> Desired Skills, Experience and Qualifications :

•	Bachelor’s degree from a top institution or a relevant degree. 
•	1-2 years relevant work experience.
•	Familiarity with project management tools and software.
•	Experience with agile development and its methodology is a plus.
•	PMP certification a plus.
•	Flexible, adaptive and responsive to project changes.
•	Excellent communication, analytical and problem solving skills.
•	Able to utilize Web technologies and Development tools.
•	Able to quickly learn company technologies and tools.
•	Familiar with industry standards.
•	Capable of working independently with little supervision.
•	Technical writing,Teaching/training and performance measuring.
•	Is experienced in managing relationships with multiple vendors and departments.
•	Experience in developing web-based tools.
•	Self-motivated with strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
•	Strong team player with the ability to prioritize and thrive in a fast paced environment .

Interested ? Apply using this form: http://bit.ly/1jLsfPe

posts.message:
DevTools Tips: DOM tree search by CSS selector

When browsing the DOM with the Elements panel, try searching (CMD+F) for nodes by their CSS selectors.
